title: "Thoughts on the Market" Preview - Mike Wilson: 3 Summer Surprises Investors Could Be Missing
description: On this preview episode of the new Morgan Stanley podcast "Thoughts on the Market", Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson says markets are typically savvy on how and when to price news events. But are markets overlooking some potential bad news?
